metadata.Title: CVE-2014-1904 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in web/servlet/tags/form/FormTag.java in Spring MVC in Spring Framework 3.0.0 before 3.2.8 and 4.0.0 before 4.0.2 allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via the requested URI in a default action.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-1904` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libspring-aop-java - 3.0.6.RELEASE-13
libspring-beans-java - 3.0.6.RELEASE-13
libspring-context-java - 3.0.6.RELEASE-13
libspring-context-support-java - 3.0.6.RELEASE-13
libspring-core-java - 3.0.6.RELEASE-13
libspring-expression-java - 3.0.6.RELEASE-13
libspring-instrument-java - 3.0.6.RELEASE-13
libspring-jdbc-java - 3.0.6.RELEASE-13
libspring-jms-java - 3.0.6.RELEASE-13
libspring-messaging-java - 3.0.6.RELEASE-13
libspring-orm-java - 3.0.6.RELEASE-13
libspring-oxm-java - 3.0.6.RELEASE-13
libspring-test-java - 3.0.6.RELEASE-13
libspring-transaction-java - 3.0.6.RELEASE-13
libspring-web-java - 3.0.6.RELEASE-13
libspring-web-portlet-java - 3.0.6.RELEASE-13
libspring-web-servlet-java - 3.0.6.RELEASE-13
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libspring-java package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.0.6.RELEASE-13').
